title: Zynga, Lululemon, Virgin Orbit, Tilray: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Lululemon said its profit will come in at the low end of its guidance; Virgin Orbit shares were gaining premarket
body:
Stock futures are wavering ahead of inflation data and the first wave of major earnings reports later this week. Here’s what we’re watching ahead of Monday’s opening bell:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
